articles.title: Mass Meeting Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Mass Meeting Held to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass meeting was held at Kim Il Sung Square on Sunday to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their smear campaign against the DPRK and the moves to escalate confrontation with it.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of party and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials of organs at different levels, industrial establishments and farms, working people from all walks of life and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang, more than 100,000 all told.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his report at the meeting that the inter-Korean relations have been driven into total collapse and a touch-and-go situation, in which a war may break out any moment, is prevailing in the Korean Peninsula due to unprecedented anti-DPRK moves and smear campaign escalated by the south Korean puppet warmongers in collusion with the U.S. and Japanese aggressors.
					
					 The case of south Korea's warship sinking is an unpardonable treacherous and anti-reunification crime as it was the hideous charade and farce cooked up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in collusion with the U.S. imperialists from A to Z, he pointed out.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The Lee group of traitors linked the case with the DPRK. This is a conspiratorial plot intended to tide over the serious ruling crisis caused by the total failure of the group's domestic and foreign policies, turn the "elections to local self-governing bodies" favorable for it and thus maintain its fascist rule and push the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe. Therefore, it is no more than the last-ditch efforts of those driven to death.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors is now concocting a despicable scenario over the case of the warship sinking to save itself from the crisis, but it is a foolish attempt.
					
					 The recent case, invented by the puppet group of traitors, has been carried out under the patronage and instigation of the U.S. imperialists from the beginning. This is part of their vicious moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and a grave challenge to its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 We will react with rapid retaliatory strike, mercilessly strong physical strike if the puppet group of traitors shows any slightest sign of "punishment" and "retaliation" in collusion with foreign forces while crying out for "confrontation".
					
					 If the puppet clique of south Korea finally provokes a war despite our repeated warnings, we will decisively wipe out traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group and build a great prosperous and reunified country for the entire nation in Korea.
					
					 We will never pardon the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and their followers who attempt to provoke the DPRK, daring slander its supreme dignity, but give a merciless and resolute punishment to the die-hard warmongers challenging justice and truth of mankind.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting by representatives from different walks of life.

articles.title: CPRK Condemns S. Korean Authorities' War Moves
articles.content:
CPRK Condemns S. Korean Authorities' War Moves
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The group of conservatives in south Korea are rushing headlong toward the reckless military confrontation and war against the DPRK while persistently linking the case of the puppet navy's warship sinking with it.
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Sunday released its information bulletin No. 955 in denunciation of such moves.
					
					 According to the bulletin, the puppet military gangsters have staged bombardment and depth-bomb dropping exercises in the waters of the West Sea of Korea from May 27 with mobilization of 10 warships of different types, including destroyers and patrol craft, and antisubmarine patrol planes while crying out for "military demonstration" and "military counteraction" under the scenario of confrontation worked out by traitor Lee Myung Bak. And they are illegally infiltrating groups of warships into the territorial waters of the DPRK every day to get on the nerves of the DPRK.
					
					 The group of traitors is also planning to stage the largest-scale joint anti-submarine exercises in the waters of the West Sea of Korea by inviting the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' warships, including the nuclear aircraft carrier belonging to the 7th Fleet, a cruiser and nuclear submarine. And it is examining a plan to conduct with the U.S. forces arge-scale field mobile exercises, equivalent to the "Team Spirit" joint military exercises which had been suspended since 1994.
					
					  Meanwhile, the group is hell-bent on spying on the military objects of the DPRK by mobilizing U-2 and other strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes of various types after raising the anti-DPRK watch posture to the phase on the eve of war. It is also seeking to resume the anti-DPRK smear psychological warfare in the frontline areas through scattering of leaflets and by means of electronic displays and loudspeakers.
					
					 The group has planned to zealously join in the U.S.-led aggressive "PSI" and thus stage the extremely provocative "intercepting drill" aimed to put sea blockade against the DPRK and search at random its vessels on voyage in open seas.
					
					 Such confrontation and war moves conducted by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in conspiracy with the U.S. are a downright military blackmail and an intolerable challenge to the DPRK.
					
					 At present the Korean Peninsula has been driven to the touch-and-go situation, in which a war may break out any moment, due to the case of the warship sinking the group of traitors fabricated to defile the DPRK's dignity and do harm to and stifle the fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is not hard to predict what consequences such military provocations and saber-rattling in the West Sea of Korea will entail since there were several skirmishes between the north and the south due to the south Korean puppet military warmongers' provocation and the recent warship sinking case occurred in those waters.
					
					 Those fond of playing with fire are bound to perish in the flames kindled by themselves. 
					
					  It is the iron will and spirit of our army and people to react to "punishment" with merciless punishment and to "retaliation" with a dreadful annihilating strike.
					
					  If the Lee Myung Bak group persists in reckless provocation, the DPRK will give more dreadful punishment to it.

articles.title: Smear Campaign Aimed at "Elections" in S. Korea Slashed
articles.content:
Smear Campaign Aimed at "Elections" in S. Korea Slashed
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is now conducting in an unprecedented vicious manner the provocative smear offensive against the DPRK under the pretext of the "security" over the case of the warship sinking.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says: 
					
					 Such campaign of the puppet authorities is getting evermore pronounced on the threshold of the "elections to the local self-governing bodies." Lurking behind this is their criminal design to calm down the resentment of the angry people toward the "government" and repress the anti-"government" struggle of the progressive forces and thus tide over the ruling crisis through smooth "elections." 
					
					 The conservative forces' "security" ruckus is nothing but a premeditated move aimed to push the political and military confrontation between the north and the south to the worst phase and ignite a war for aggression on the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces. It is also an anti-reunification repressive move intended to stifle the pro-reunification democratic forces demanding the reconciliation and unity with fellow countrymen and the national reunification. 
					
					 Such campaign will bring nothing to the south Korean authorities.  The more frantic the conservative forces are getting with the "security" racket over the warship sinking, the stronger the resentment and resistance of the people will grow.
					
					 In actuality prevailing in south Korea is the atmosphere of struggle to overthrow the dictatorship under veil of "pragmatism". People from all walks of life are slashing at the puppet authorities who are hell-bent on anti-DPRK confrontation with the "elections" at hand, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere. The progressive forces are all out in the struggle with resolution and will to turn the upcoming "elections" into a stage for punishing the treacherous regime. This movement shows that the group of traitors' "security" racket does not work on the south Korean people and, accordingly, the group can not get rid of a stern judgment by the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Traitors' Moves to Ignite War Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Traitors' Moves to Ignite War Condemned
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces decided to resume the conspiratorial anti-DPRK psychological warfare in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and have begun to put it into practice. 
					 Meanwhile, they have agreed to stage the largest-scale combined anti-submarine exercises in the waters of the West Sea of Korea together with the U.S. and are seeking to fully participate in the "PSI" maneuvers, conducted by the U.S. in a bid to put a military blockade on the DPRK, in the latter half of this year.
					
					 Commenting on such moves, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 They are a serious military provocation to the DPRK and very reckless scheme to unleash a war by extremely aggravating the tension of the Korean Peninsula created due to the case of warship sinking.
					
					 After announcing the conspiratorial "results of investigation" which assert that their warship was sunken by "torpedo attack of the north", the south Korean group of traitors are working hard to convince the people at home and abroad of the "results". This attempt is intended to invent a pretext for igniting a war by making it an established fact  that the case was caused by the DPRK, that is "its armed attack" on south Korea.
					
					 Such intention is well evidenced by the above-said moves of the puppet military.
					
					The reality shows that the anti-DPRK moves of the group of traitors, which has cried out for "resolute countermeasure" and "punishment" while groundlessly linking the case of warship sinking with the DPRK, have reached the full-scale stage of provoking a war in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 There is a saying that those who like a war are bound to be killed in the war. The group of traitors will be doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits by the strong retaliatory strike of the DPRK which has no limitation and knows no mercy.

articles.title: S. Korea's "Military Demonstration" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's "Military Demonstration" Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The "military demonstration" being staged by the south Korean puppet forces is to convince the world people that the warship was sunken by the "torpedo attack of the north", lay a foundation for re-assumption to power in the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and justify and escalate their moves to ignite a war against the DPRK. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 An overall war will be unavoidable if the warmongers escalate the war games, the commentary notes, and says:
					
					 The puppet forces issued an order to take "rapid counteraction" under the "judgment of field commander". This increased the possibility of the said war.
					
					 What is serious is the fact that they seek to bring down the DPRK through such "military demonstration".
					
					 In fact, the conservative group of south Korea have openly claimed that the "military demonstration is intended to make the north's navy stage the corresponding exercises in nearly two months," "it is a strategy to make the north's navy use up fuel, food, ammunition and its command and seamen exhaust their physical strength" and the Team Spirit joint military exercises should be resumed.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK are in full readiness to annihilate at one stroke all of the aggressors if not only the Lee Myong Bak group but also its masters the U.S. and Japan jointly may attack  them.
					
					 That is why the U.S. has so far been unable to unleash a war against the DPRK, though watching for a chance. 
					
					 It is poor for the Lee group, not knowing of such reality, to intend to provoke the DPRK while staging the "military demonstration".
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK will give a resolute punishment to the group now that it is staging the "military demonstration" against the DPRK. This is by no means an empty threat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Socialism as Rosy Future of Mankind
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Socialism as Rosy Future of Mankind
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Socialism represents the bright future of mankind, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 Socialist society is a genuine popular society for the masses of the people and the basic mission of socialism is to defend and ensure the interests of the working masses, the article notes, and goes on to say:
					
					 Socialist society prompts the rapid development of society by providing a broad avenue for putting into practice the independent aspiration and desire of the popular masses. Socialism captured the mind of the popular masses and has steadily advanced on its orbit as this is an ideal society representing the future of mankind.
					
					 The imperialists have made desperate efforts to tarnish the image of socialism while slandering it in every way in an attempt to cover up the reactionary nature and corruptness of the capitalist system and weaken and stifle socialism.
					
					 Astonishing miracles and changes are now taking place in the DPRK. This is a vivid manifestation of the validity and truth of the socialist cause and its invincibility.  
					
					 Socialism is making big strides, demonstrating its greater might with each passing day for its validity, scientific accuracy and truth. 
					
					Socialism enjoys absolute trust and support from the progressive people of the world, and it has become an irresistible trend of the times that mankind advances along the road of independence and socialism.
					
					 The just cause of defending and advancing socialism can never be realized without fierce struggle against the hostile forces working hard to oppose and stifle it.
					
					 Any moment's stop to the struggle against imperialism may lower the speed of the advance of socialism and retrograde the world socialist cause.
					
					 The socialist idea is as ever just, and it is the undeniable truth of history that socialism representing the ideal and future of mankind emerges victorious.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a signed article to the 20th publication anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Issues Related to the Ideological Groundwork of Socialism."
					 In the work, published on May 30, Juche 79 (1990), Kim Jong Il comprehensively clarified the theory on the ideological groundwork of socialism, basing himself on the scientific insight into the realities of the world socialist movement.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is solid and invincible because the DPRK regards the great Songun idea of Juche as its guidelines and collectivism as life and soul and fundamental basis of socialism and invariably adheres to the revolutionary principle, the socialist principle under any conditions and circumstance, the article notes, and says:
					
					 Thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's Songun idea and Songun politics, our army and people have reliably defended Korean-style socialism, overcoming the difficult trials of the "Arduous March", the forced march. And they have made the dynamic advance for brining earlier the bright future of a thriving nation.
					
					 Today the whole party and army and all the people are rallied as one in mind around Kim Jong Il and are vigorously accelerating the general advance to open the gate to a thriving nation. This reality of the DPRK is a vivid expression of the invincible might of Korean-style socialism based on collectivism.
					
					 It is a vital problem related to the fate of the country and the nation to keep the revolutionary principle, the socialist principle at the present time when the acute confrontation with the U.S. imperialists is going on. 
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary faith and will of our army and people who are confidently advancing along the road of socialism chosen by themselves despite the imperialists and other reactionaries' ceaseless moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- 39 civic, public and religious organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society jointly called a press conference outside the building of the puppet foreign ministry on May 26.
					 A press release was read out at the conference. It referred to the fact that the U.S. secretary of State visited south Korea to discuss what is called "follow-up measures" as regards the case of the sinking of warship "Cheonan". 
					
					 The U.S. is getting hell-bent on the scheme to put sanctions on the DPRK while inciting the Lee Myung Bak group because it intended to use the case as a lever of putting pressure on the DPRK, the press release said.
					
					 Expressing opposition to any sanctions which may escalate the crisis of a war on the Korean Peninsula, it demanded that the U.S. immediately retract the plot it is hatching together with the south Korean authorities. 
					
					 On the same day, the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement to denounce the Lee Myong Bak group of traitors for getting evermore pronounced in the scheme to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a war with the said case as an occasion.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Finnish Juche Idea Organization Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Finnish Juche Idea Organization Held
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Helsinki on May 21. 
					 The meeting reviewed the activities of the committee, discussed the future tasks and dealt with organizational affairs. 
					
					 Chairman Juha Kieksy and other personages made addresses at the meeting.
					
					They said that the achievements recently made in the DPRK prove the validity of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Calling for learning as much as possible from socialist construction in the DPRK based on the Juche idea, they expressed their determination to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea. 
					
					 They also expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in the drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: US and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Campaign Slammed
articles.content:
US and S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Campaign Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- A political party and organizations of UK staged a demonstration in protest against the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK moves outside the south Korean puppet embassy in London on May 21 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising. 
					 Taking part in the demonstration were personages of the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the New Communist Party of Britain and popular masses. 
					
					 Speeches were made before the demonstration. 
					
					 Kevin Cain, organizational secretary of the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, denounced the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for having turned Kwangju into a sea of blood three decades ago.
					
					 He referred to the anti-DPRK smear campaign being escalated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities these days, and read out the May 20 statement of a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said it is abnormal that the south Korean authorities are allowed to keep their "embassy" in London. And he strongly condemned the Lee Myong Bak puppet clique for persistently cracking down upon the pro-reunification patriots in south Korea with the "National Security Law" left intact.
					
					 The demonstrators denounced the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime for rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula strained. While in demonstration they were holding DPRK flags and placards carrying such letters as "The U.S. imperialists, take hands off Korea!" and "No to 'UN sanctions'!" and chanting "Abolish the 'NSL'!", "Down with Lee Myong Bak!" and other slogans. 
					
					 They also distributed copies of literature disclosing the Kwangju massacre.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on May 24, which warned that another Kwangju popular uprising would take place anytime to thrust the U.S. imperialists and the puppet regime into the sea.

articles.title: DPRK's Resolute Stand Hailed in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK's Resolute Stand Hailed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Mexico made public a joint statement on May 23 in support of the statements issued by spokesmen for the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 They are the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Party and the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of the President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 Noting that it has been evident that the case of the south Korean puppet navy's warship sinking and the "results of investigation" into it were a farce cooked up by the south Korean authorities at the U.S. approval, patronage and instigation from A to Z, the statement contended that the DPRK has nothing to do with the case. 
					
					 Political parties and organizations of Mexico fully support the DPRK's resolute stand that it will react to the reckless "countermeasure" of the U.S. and the Lee Myong Bak group of traitors with an all-out war of justice, it declared.
					
					 Hailing the DPRK's decision to dispatch its inspection group to the spot of south Korea in order to verify the "material evidence" presented in the "results of investigation" and urging the group of traitors to immediately receive the inspection group, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should behave themselves, well aware that it is the invariable and iron will of the army and the people of the DPRK to react to "retaliation" with stronger retaliation and to "punishment" with indiscriminate punishment. 
					
					  We call upon all the governments, political parties and organizations of the world to reject the recent case as a ridiculous and clumsy "charade" and "fabrication" cooked up by the south Korean group of traitors under the patronage of the U.S. and actively support and encourage the Korean people in their struggle to defend the security of the country and the nation.

articles.title: CRPP condena la banda de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Pyongyaneses condenan a los yanquis y banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de la ciudad de Pyongyang para denunciar las maniobras de confrontacion e intriga de los imperialistas yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes mas de cientos de miles de trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes, incluyendo Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones, fabricas, empresas y granjas a todos niveles en esta capital.
					
					 El secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Choe Yong Rim, en su informe, dijo que en la Peninsula Coreana se crea una situacion tan grave en que las relaciones Norte-Sur se hallan en una catastrofe global y se puede desencadenar la guerra en cualquier momento debido a las maniobras sin precedentes de enfrentamiento e intrigas anti-RPDC de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos confabulados con los agresores yanquis y japoneses.
					
					 El incidente de hundimiento del buque "Cheonan" de la marina de guerra del ejercito titere surcoreano es la siniestra farsa inventada por la banda del traidor Lee en contubernio con los imperialistas yanquis e imperdonable crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion, senalo el informante y continuo:
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee relaciono el citado incidente con la RPDC, lo cual no pasa de ser ultimos esfuerzos de quienes estan en la derrota, siendo el complot intrigante para evitar la grave crisis creada por la bancarrota general de su politica interna y externa, realizar sin complicaciones las "elecciones de autonomia local" para mantener la dominacion fascista y llevar a la catastrofe las relaciones N-S.
					
					Aunque la banda de los traidores titeres intenta evitar tal crisis tramando la sucia intriga relativa al incidente de hundimiento del buque, esto resulta un acto absurdo.
					
					Este incidente es la atroz maniobra de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC elaborada y cometida desde el principio bajo el amparo y manipulacion de los imperialistas yanquis y deviene el grave desafio a la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Si la banda traidora surcoreana muestra el minimo movimiento de "castigo" y la "represalia" en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras hablando de llamado "enfrentamiento", la RPDC le respondera con el inmediato golpe de venganza y el fuerte fisico sin piedad. 
					
					Si ella desata por fin la guerra pese a nuestras advertencias repetidas, la RPDC aniquilara rotundamente a la banda de Lee Myung Bak, traidor a la nacion y construira en esta tierra la gran potencia reunificada donde prosperara toda la nacion coreana.
					
					No perdonaremos jamas a los agresores yanquis y japoneses y sus satelites que se atreven a insultar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y a tocarla y asestaremos implacable castigo rotundo a los monstruosos maniacos de guerra que desafian a la justicia y la verdad de la humanidad.
					
					En el mitin hubo discursos de los delegados de distintos sectores.

articles.title: Pyongyaneses condenan a los yanquis y banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP condena la banda de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la banda de conservadores surcoreanos toma el camino de imprudente enfrentamiento militar y de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea relacionando de continuo con esta el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" del ejercito titere, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 30 la informacion No. 955.
					 Segun trascendidos, de acuerdo con el guion de enfrentamiento del traidor Lee Myung Bak, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano hablan tanto de la supuesta "manifestacion del poderio militar" y "enfrentamiento militar", realizan a partir del dia 27 en las aguas del Mar Oeste los ejercicios de bombardeo naval y de lanzamiento de las bombas de profundidad movilizando 10 buques de guerra de distintos generos como el destructor y la corbeta y el avion patrullero anti-submarinos y perpetran abiertamente la provocacion militar contra la RPDC infiltrando cada dia ilegalmente el grupo de buques de guerra en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					 Tambien, la banda de los traidores planea realizar los ejercicios combinados antisubmarinos de gran envergadura en el mismo Mar Oeste introduciendo los buques de guerra de las tropas agresivas pertenecientes a la septima flota norteamericana incluyendo el portaviones nuclear, el crucero y el submarino nuclear.
					
					 Ademas, examina el proyecto de realizar junto con las tropas yanquis el ejercicio movil al aire libre de gran envergadura equivalente al simulacro militar conjunto "Team Spirit" suspendido en el periodo posterior a 1994.
					
					 Por otra parte, llevo a la etapa de visperas de la guerra el estado de vigilancia de informaciones sobre la RPDC. Segun esto, desarrolla de manera frenetica las actividades de espionaje sobre los objetos militares de la RPDC movilizando el "U-2" y otros aviones de reconocimiento estrategico y tactico de distintos generos y trata de reanudar la guerra psicologica e intrigante contra la RPDC mediante la pulverizacion de volantes, las pantallas electronicas y altavoces en las cercanias de la primera linea del frente. 
					
					 Y planea desarrollar hasta los "ejercicios de interceptacion interna y externa" de caracter muy provocativo para bloquear la RPDC en el mar y registrar arbitrariamente los barcos de esta en alta mar participando activamente en la agresiva "Iniciativa de No Proliferacion de las Armas de Exterminio Masivo" auspiciada por EE.UU.  
					
					 Tales alborotos de enfrentamiento y de guerra, que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak perpetra en contubernio con EE.UU., devienen la abierta amenaza y chantaje militares e imperdonable desafio contra la RPDC.
					
					 Hoy en dia, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta en el estado tan tenso en que puede estallar en cualquier momento la guerra debido al incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra del ejercito titere inventado por la banda del traidor Lee para calumniar la dignidad de la RPDC, denigrar y aplastar a los connacionales.
					
					  Es obvio cual consecuencia traeran la provocacion militar y la campana belica en el Mar Oeste donde debido a las maniobras provocativas de los belicistas del circulo militar titere se desarrollaron en varias ocasiones los conflictos militares entre el Norte y el Sur y se invento el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra.
					
					  Es la ley que la mariposa nocturna se muere quemada.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea tienen la ferrea voluntad y coraje de responder con el implacable castigo al "castigo" y con el golpe demoledor a la "represalia".
					
					  Si la banda de Lee Myung Bak sigue tomando la provocacion imprudente, la RPDC le dara el castigo mas terrible.
